product_name: Metolius Greatest Chips Screw-On Holds - Package of 40
long_description: Get started on a homemade climbing wall with this package of 40 Metolius Greatest Chips Screw-on holds. Screw-on holds attach to plywood walls using wood screws. Holds are made from durable, textured polyester resin for lasting performance and easy gripping. Mounting hardware included.
short_description: Get started on a homemade climbing wall with this package of 40 Metolius Greatest Chips Screw-on holds.
